mapper.select:
select t.name typename,count(e.score) cnt from dic t left join num_info_v v on t.guid=v.type LEFT JOIN evaluate e ON v.guid = e.nguid where 1=1
group by t.name
mapper.sql: select sum(CASE when score=5 then 1 else 0 end) satisfy2, sum(CASE when score=4 then 1 else 0 end) satisfy1, sum(CASE when score=3 then 1 else 0 end) satisfy, sum(CASE when score=2 then 1 else 0 end) basic, sum(CASE when score=1 then 1 else 0 end) notsatisfy, sum(CASE when score=0 then 1 else 0 end) no
mapper.select: select guid,name,pic from sys_user where guid=#{guid}

select u.name,u.pic,'服务评价不满意' msg,w.name winname, DATE_FORMAT(e.addtime ,'%H:%i') addtime from evaluate e INNER JOIN sys_user u on e.userid=u.guid left join window w on e.winid=w.guid where e.score=1 and to_days(e.addtime) = to_days(now()) order by e.addtime desc

select u.name,u.pic,t.cardno,t.cname,w.guid,e.id, case when e.score=1 then '非常不满意' when e.score=2 then '不满意' when e.score=3 then '基本满意' when e.score=4 then '满意' when e.score=5 then '非常满意' else '未评价' end star, e.num,w.name winname, date_format(e.addtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') addtime2, date_format(e.addtime, '%m-%d %H:%i') addtime from evaluate e INNER JOIN sys_user u on e.userid=u.guid LEFT JOIN window w on e.winid=w.guid LEFT JOIN ( select guid,cardno,cname from num_info union all select guid,cardno,cname from num_info_all ) t on e.nguid= t.guid where 1=1
ORDER BY e.addtime desc
